channel.title: [317 Help] Wield Item After Quest [317 Help]
channel.description: I Need Help I have a 317 but I cant use any dragon or magic because you have to finish a quest to use it but I don't have the quest to do to make able to wield can any one help me so you don't have to do quest. Thanks

item.title: [317 Help] Wield Item After Quest [317 Help]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

or just add it so players complete the quest automatically at login.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 Help] Wield Item After Quest [317 Help]

item.title: [317 Help] Wield Item After Quest [317 Help]
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Open client.java, and search for the message you get when trying to equip the weapon.
Remove the piece of code that is limiting you from equiping it, save, compile, and enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 Help] Wield Item After Quest [317 Help]
